item.description:
Hi Westport Boston Terrier Meetup Friends
We will be meeting at our home in Westport and then heading to Barbara and Steves home in Mashpee,Mass. They have kindly invited us to their Bed and Breakfast.We will be leaving our home at 9am. We are planning to take the moterhome so that everyone can come with us. Please let me know asap if you are planning to attend!
Robyn-we can pick you up at Walmart in Fairhaven!
Hope to see everyone on June 7th!!!
Bob and Linda Bramwell

group.name: The Westport Boston Terrier Meetup Group

item.name: The Westport Boston Terrier June Meetup
